column4: does anyone have a solution for the "alt-shift-tab" not working?
have you got effects enabled in Appearance?
try turning them off and on?
go in keyboard shortcut and add a shortcut
i tried what u suggested for the alt-shift-tab in appearance, but nothing happened
when you've turned off the effects, but haven't turned them back on yet, does alt-tab work?
its the alt-shift-tab that don't work
is it possible that my nvidia driver is screwing it up?
I wouldn't know, but I highly doubt it.
damn :S, it was working a few days ago, may while i was trying to work my webcam, i change something but i wouldn't know what
ooohhhhh wait hold on, i think i found the problem
i found why i had the problem, in my keyboard setup, i had put "alt-shift" to switch between languages and thats what was causing my problem, thanks for helping me think clearly :P
my god, I am such an idiot! I had just the same problem in the past, but I had completely forgotten about it!
